figure.head: Figure
figure.figDesc:
Powder X-ray diffraction patterns of the samples with the intended oxygen content
1-y=0.90, 0.85, 0.80, 0.75 and 0.70.

figure.head: Figure
figure.figDesc:
Temperature dependence of the
magnetic susceptibility for 1-y=0.85, 0.80, 0.75
and 0.70 sample.

figure.head: Figure
figure.figDesc:
Electronic phase diagram drawn from
the a-parameters and T c for the samples
synthesized so far. The upper scale shows the
oxygen content 1-y* estimated by the neutron
diffraction analysis.
